Package de.edux.augmentation.core

Klasse AbstractAugmentation

java.lang.Object
de.edux.augmentation.core.AbstractAugmentation
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
BlurAugmentation, BrightnessAugmentation, ColorEqualizationAugmentation, ContrastAugmentation, CroppingAugmentation, ElasticTransformationAugmentation, FlippingAugmentation, MonochromeAugmentation, NoiseInjectionAugmentation, PerspectiveTransformationsAugmentation, RandomDeleteAugmentation, ResizeAugmentation
public abstract class AbstractAugmentation extends Object
Abstract class for augmentation operations. All specific augmentation classes should extend this.
